instructions.title: How To Delete Your Edmodo Account
instructions.before: In order to delete your Edmodo Account my must log on the the contact page from a Desktop browser. You cannot delete your account from the App on a mobile device.  But, before deletion can be started you have to go to the account setting page and make sure you have an email address associated with your account.

qnAnswers.question: Can I delete my Account from the Mobile App?
qnAnswers.answer: No.  You cannot delete your Edmodo account from within the App.  To complete deletion you must navigate to the Contact Us page from a Desktop Browser.  You can only locate the page by clicking on the Contact Us link.

qnAnswers.question: Can I delete my information from a group without Deleting My Whole Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Yes. You can submit a ticket to delete your account from a specific group without deleting the entire Edmodo account.

qnAnswers.question: What happens to the information on my Edmodo Account when I Delete My Account?
qnAnswers.answer: When a Student account is deleted, all student work and grades associated with that account will be lost. This information will be wiped from the system.

steps: Please Click the Red Delete Link to navigate to the Edmodo Contact Us Page
Please select "Account Types, Passwords, and Deactivations"
Make sure you type the email address associated with your account
Under what keywords describe your selection please type "Delete Account"
Then in the “How Can we Help” section please write “I am requesting to Delete My Account”
For “Account Types, Passwords, and Deactivations” please write “Deactivate My Account”
For “What device are you using to access Edmodo?” please write “Web browser, ie chrome, safari, firefox”
